message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe its value to you is worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $12000. Let's discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $10000 on this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to make this deal attractive for both of us, I am proposing a counteroffer of $11500 for the product. This still reflects its true value while staying within your budget. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your offer, I am willing to accept $10800 for the product. I believe this price reflects its worth while also accommodating your budget. I hope this settles the matter satisfactorily for both parties.
